title: "We as ADC mains don't want more power we just want less snowball so we can be a late game class"

replies.body:
I want to actually feel like we have so agency at some point of the game. Currently we don't have agency in lane or mid game and if late game comes around (barely happens) you still get raped by the tanky ass rengar or talon or Irelia, Renekton, Evelynn shaco. So much stuff that has been making your life impossible since min 10.

As ADC you get shit on by everything early, mid and late game. The same stuff that's been raping you since min 10 is raping you min 40 and it just makes play ADC unbearable this needs to be addressed, this is exactly why playing Lucian is so fun.

thats their job. killing the squishies. they are call assassins.

It shouldn't be if they're behind. They are supposed to be high risk, high reward. If they're capable of doing their job when they're behind just as easily as if they were ahead, where the hell is the risk for this huge reward? At no point should a 0/4 assassin still be doing his "job". If an ADC was 0/4, they wouldn't be able to perform their job of consistent damage. If a tank was 0/4, they wouldn't be able to do their job of tanking and disrupting. If a mage was 0/4, they wouldn't have been able to do their job of AoE magic damage. Why should Assassins still be able to do their jobs when they're behind?

Honestly when behind they pretty much become dive bomb champions with the expectation to die even if they get the kill. Only in teamfights though. 

Because of the nature of base defense, ADCs wouldn’t be durable enough to avoid burst when fed unless they have certain items.

> [{quoted}](name=nobotninja,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bAOkpPT3,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-14T12:12:41.914+0000)
>
> ... Like, come on, I killed your whole team with 3 items, how can I not be stronger with a full build? 

While I agree with you in general about the state of damage, that statement is misleading. With ability damage, especially burst damage, they do hit a hard cap somewhere mid-lategame. That's *usually* when ability casters like Renekton and Pantheon fall off, because they no longer "one shot", because at that point, base stats coupled with a little defense make one shotting (bar perfect execution of a single target assassin) impossible. 

Most early game snowballers fall off that way. In a way, a 3 item AP Malphite (at the stage of the game he's supposed to be in at 3 items) is far scarier than a 6 item AP Malphite at 30 minutes in, even if he's the most fed guy and the first to complete his build. You are one-shotting people who with {{champion:54}} {{item:1001}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3108}}{{item:1082}}  is because you are level 11 vs probably a level 8 {{champion:51}} {{item:1001}} {{item:3095}}{{item:1055}} who have lower base stats, 0 defense and because you've maxed your main damage skill.

You won't be one shotting anymore {{champion:54}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3102}} vs {{champion:51}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3095}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3139}} at level 18, especially if their support has some form of mitigation for their team.
By one shot do you mean you were incredibly low and they happened to kill you?
Maybe on most adcs that's true, but jhin probably just auto q autos the assassin while running at Mach 20 to dodge all skillshots..
hyperbole is very fun isn't it?

Easy, put more power into abilities and less into the items so that when you're fed and ahead, you do better. Then they should reduce catch up exp somewhat so that it actually means something, and those who are able to get more exp and gold are able to actually show it.
ADC player here. I would willingly give up crit as a stat if it means I get agency.

> [{quoted}](name=l Main Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bAOkpPT3,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-14T16:19:38.270+0000)

Other classes are playable.

Swain, Heimer, Yasuo, Karthus are seeing bot lane play.

That's just few champion vs literraly every marksmen.

Swain, Yasuo and Karthus have so little play rate bot lane they aren't even figured on champion.gg in bot lane.

Its not like the other lanes are viable for most marksmen to go due to their kit or their laner match up, you can't just send cait top and expect to win just like you can't send nasus bot, everytime a adc gets popular in any other role they get their legs broken so if you don't want us bot we don't want other classes taking the one thing we have, Graves being the exception since he is just a fighter  and he hasn't been in bot since his update anyway.

Quinn, Jayce, Vayne, Teemo top
Grave, Kindred, Twitch Jungler
Corkie, Varus, Lucian Mid
MF support.

The main difference is there are some adc designed for other lane like grave. But you don't see that bot, the only non marksmen designed for bot lane is Zigg and he isn't sucessfull.

Dude be consistent if you are going to make bullshit claims ._. 

Jayce is not a marksman, Vayne has no playrate  top and has never had good winrates there, Teemo is not a marksman and has been sitting top pretty much from the start. 

Graves is not a marksman, Kindred is, Twitch has 0,5% playrate and 46% winrate jungle.

Varus and Lucian do not exist mid, Lucian was actually nerfed explicitly to get him out from mid along with Jhin earlier, and Corki has 0,5 playrate and 48% winrate. 

MF support is a super specific counter pick to like .....Zyra?  It has 41% winrate and 0,6% pickrate because people try to play it generally. 

Now about Karthus and others in the botlane.

Karthus has a low pickrate, 0,7%, but he also has 54% winrate bot.

Swain, 0,6 P and 51% W rate. 

Heimer 0,85% P and 51,5% winrate.

Mordekaiser 0,7 P, 50,6% win rate.......so before you go all like "but they have no playrate botlane!" go look at your own picks first.

Sure, there are "marksman like" picks outside botlane and Kindred even works well outside botlane.

But you know, the biggest issue with all these is that that they suck outside their designated role.'

Graves is a garbage tier botlaner, twitch, twitch,varus and Lucian are all shit outside botlane, Vayne toplane never had more than 48% winrate and 4% pickrate if i recall, and this at her best. 

Hells Corki was even a dead pick for a while on OP.GG with less than 0,1% pickrate. 

So what happens if you "open" the role for picks like Swain, karthus or Heimer by some means?

The marksmen who dont work outside botlane become utterly useless and have literally no place left in the game, but the worst that happens to those guys if botlane closes is that they go back to midlane.


Botlane plays in a unique way and only champs that are highly adapted to it work there, the reason most mages and melee can never work there is just because they are hard countered by the supports.....like what use is a the average mage if their burst cant kill someone and even runs out of mana quickly after?

They have no way to skirmish with just 1-2 hits before backing up to lifesteal/heal either.

Heimer works because he basically takes a zone and is nigh unkillable inside it, Karthus works because he scales incredibly well and does DPS as his main damage.

Swain ......i dont really know, havent actually seen a good one yet but i suppose its his E and ability to just walk in with R and become a monster post 6 until late that the weaker marksmen cant deal with.

I can't take you seriously if you say Jayce & Grave aren't marksmen. Marksmen is listed as primary role on Grave and secondary on Jayce. Because riot no longer display primary/secondary role on client you can't remember them? Have you just started play league and pretend you know everything?
and of course you talk about everyone of them except teemo because you have no counter argument.

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/taking-another-look-subclasses

Before you start dropping insults and making a fool of yourself you should look at the official statements. 


Jayce, Gnar, Graves, teemo and even Quinn are listed as "Unique playstyles", meaning that the way you play them and/or the way they work doesnt fit into any other archetype. 

Kayle goes in there as well.
Yeah and they called Ahri Sustained damage and  classified her Burst mage in the same year with no change on her kit. It's commonly know Riot make a fool of themself.

When and where did this exactly?  And who wrote it?

But regardless of that i guess one could say that all mages have "sustained" damage to a 
degree, main abilities tend to have less than 3-4 seconds cooldown and Ahri´s Q lands exactly there.

Syndra later on has short/fairly short cooldowns on everything as well, Q goes down to like 2,8 seconds if i recall, W wouldnt be more than 4-5 seconds, and it deals true damage as well. 

In  the same vein one could call Zyra a burst mage, she can easily combo to delete squishy champs after all, despite how she is supposed to be a AOE/zone specialist rather than something else. 


However mages being capable in different areas rather than a single one doesnt really change that when it boils down to it, Ahri is a far better burst mage than say Karthus but Karthus is completely uncontested in DPS potential between the two.

They all dip into different fields but they do specialize greatly in one or another and thats where the class classification comes from.

Reason Graves or Jayce cant be counted as marksmen is because they dip into far too many different area´s and some are even in direct contrast towards the marksmen standard.

It would jus be nice to matter, honestly... like, the boards scream their moronic little heads off that ADCs are a late game class but when ADCs were in their late game with their late game items, it suddenly wasnt okay that they were three and four shotting everyone with AAs...

You literally have to play so perfectly on ADCs right now, even if you have a lead, because you're squishy and your items no longer really do damage to squishy targets and you dont really have the means to 1v1 even a behind assassin. It really sucks that, on an ADC, being 5/1 after laning phase with good CS actually still means you're still behind everyone else by miles. Even if the Assassin midlane is 0/3 with just a dirk or mid game, the Irelia thats been feeding her ass off all game just finished her Trinity, it doesn't matter if you have two or sometimes three completed items over them; they'll still destroy you instantly if you dont play around them.

No other class can honestly say that they still have to play around a behind assassin or bruiser when they're ahead. :/

No matter what the boards say, at high levels of play the only time botlane really mattered was during Ardent Meta. This can be seen in every worlds in existence. What was important this worlds? Mid and jungle. What was important in seasons 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1? Mid and fucking jungle. Bot lane was important one worlds and they had to grossly over buff multiple factors to make that happen.

Yeah except ADCs werent doing it in LATEGAME but by the time they had shiv and BF sword. 
Maximum at two items IE and SHIV they were three shotting everyone.
Is this lategame? 
Building two of the cheapest items? 
You had your freelo for three seasons now. 

Yet everywhere in soloQ in every elo lucians, kai'sa, jhins etc. run around carrying game after game. 
Maybe it is you? Cuz reading this is what every adc player wants: being the best at everything at all times while doing nothing for it.

No, they weren't. They never were and if they were, it could have been remedied by nerfing the damage on shiv. Furthermore, the game has changed pretty drastically; late game is two items at 25 minutes. And if it isnt by your book, Jax needs to be absolutely gutted since he is doing late game damage with just Trinity. Uh, I'm sorry, is late game *one item*? 

And good job naming two ADCs who dont build crit. One is even an early game champion. Jhin also doesn't even need to build crit either for that matter. So where are champs like Cait, Trist, Varus, Kog, Xayah at? Take away Stormrazor and where are jinx, twitch, sivir at? 

Maybe what ADCs want is what everyone else already has. Agency, lane diversity, early as fuck late games, damage to both tanks and squishies(bruisers anyone? Literally gets to blow up both tanks and squishies indescriminately with usually just one item to their name but yeah, ADCs want too much for wanting relevance; I mean it's not like they have to worry about that behind Assassin 1 shotting them from full health either if they're ahead either because, while their items are expensive, they literally get the best of both worlds with both damage and tankiness).

If a class is going to build full fucking damage with 0 options for defenses, 0 agency, 0 early game power, and 0 lane diversity with no hope of being able to even survive the stiffest of breezes, then they should be 1 shotting everyone with absurd damage.

And good job ignoring how every worlds ever has been about mid and jungle and the first time it was about bot lane, everyone whined and screamed until riot changed it back.
